titleStmt.title: Private Letter: 1897 February 19: to de Lisle

sourceDesc.p: MTG HB m64/14, m67/37, 57844. Reproduced in Starnes JH 1961. Colenso and the Bay of Plenty. Whakatane Historical Review; IX (4) 154–166. Colenso included a photograph of himself.

front.p: 1897 February 19: to de Lisle MTG HB m64/14, m67/37, 57844. Reproduced in Starnes JH 1961. Colenso and the Bay of Plenty. Whakatane Historical Review; IX (4) 154–166. Colenso included a photograph of himself.

body.p: I have taken on me to send you the enclosed, hoping you may receive them: and, possibly, in years to come you may tell Rodolph Maia of the original.—
I trust the dear boy is continuing well.
And with kind regards, I am
